mapper.select: select * from pj_user where user_id =#{user_id} and password =#{password} and user_grade not in (0)
mapper.update: update pj_user set nickname=#{nickname}, password=#{password}, user_name=#{user_name}, phone=#{phone}, zip_no=#{zip_no}, addr=#{phone}, addr2=#{addr2} where user_id = #{user_id}
update pj_user set user_grade = 0 where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from pj_Like where user_id=#{user_id} order by like_time desc

select DISTINCT p.product_id,p.pd_status,p.pd_name, p.pd_price,p.pd_price0,p.pd_img,t.trade_time, p.pd_discount,p.pd_date from pj_trade_test t,pj_product p where t.product_id=p.product_id and (t.sell_user_id=#{user_id} or t.buyer_user_id=#{user_id}) group by p.product_id,p.pd_status,p.pd_name,t.trade_time, p.pd_price,p.pd_price0,p.pd_img, p.pd_discount,p.pd_date order by t.trade_time desc
select * from pj_Board where user_id=#{user_id} and board_status=1 order by board_write_time desc
select * from pj_Comment c,pj_user u where c.user_id=u.user_id and c.user_id=#{user_id} order by c.comment_write_time desc
select * from pj_Report where user_id=#{user_id} order by re_time desc
select count(*) from pj_user where user_id=#{user_id} and password=#{password}
